resources.string: BonCoeur 소개 및 BonCouer가 제공하는 서비스, 사용방법에 대한 image+text 설명

BonCoeur is designed for children with Rheumatic heart disease (RHD) especially in developing countries. BonCoeur service is intended to help making correct diagnoses without doctor\'s visit. Just record heart sounds and take pictures. Professional physicians will make a diagnosis for you in no time.
Access your account and help children in need
BonCoeur will send you the result by email.
Your request has been successfully submitted
Your device is not connected to a network. Please try sending data again later when the Internet is available.(Main page > SEND menu > choose the name you recorded before)
click "Record", recording will automatically start and stop in 30 seconds.
